FuncDef: This command is used to redirect unicast packets arriving on an automatically (using theauto-bind-tunnelcommand) or manually configured (using aspoke-sdpcommand, but not thespoke-sdpcommand under the VPRN IP interface) binding in a VPRN to a policer in an ingress forwarding plane queue-group for the purpose of rate-limiting.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the network policy identification. The value uniquely identifies the policy on the system. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the name of the queue group template up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
